title: AMBER GEMSTONE Meaning - Crystal Of Joy, Luck & Confidence
cleaned_text:
Amber is a bright coloured, fossilized tree resin with wonderful healing abilities. Considered a gemstone and worn in jewellery like a crystal, it has been used for healing for thousands of years.

Baltic amber is much older and so more valued than younger amber. Amber ranges in colour from yellow to green to golden and brown.A purifying and cleansing stone that is also very uplifting to the mind, emotions and spirit. Brings confidence, releases negativity, opens us up to joy. Known to cleanse the aura.Brilliant to use if feeling depressed, or down on our luck. A stone of good luck and abundance. Wonderful to wear during winter months when mood is affected by dreary weather and there seems no hope of change.A powerful stone of protection, wards off negative energy, especially negative energy attacks. Also works to reduce fears, phobias, and also stress, a comforting stone to have around.Is said to have a similar effect to that of penicillin.Can aid treatment of both kidneys and bladder, whilst helping to heal the nervous system and balance left and right sides of the brain. Recommended for stomach issues.Is said to "draw disease out of the body", namely the spleen and liver.Use for joint or arthritic problems.Energises the body and mind, can help to kick start healing on many levels. Also good for purifying the blood.Main sources are the Baltic Regions, Russia, Poland, Britain, Italy and Germany.
